title: Widgets
description: Widgets to display device info, latest releases or latest betas

title: Android Versions
description: Display Android version within the app for quick reference.

title: Android Studio Releases
description: DDisplay Android Studio releases within the app, with notifications for new versions based on channels (Release/Beta/Canary/etc.) for users to stay up-to-date with the latest development tools.

title: Tip Jar
description: Voluntary tipping to support development. Completely optional with no obligation. No additional features will be locked behind a paywall. All app features will continue to be free and ad-free.
